history.title: Senior UI/UX Engineer
history.description: Lead a team of developers in charge of building and maintaining user interfaces across 15+ international corporate merchandising sites. Develop and maintain brand consistency. Create comprehensive style guides for other developers to use on a daily basis. Provide functional prototypes of complex pages, components, and interactions.  Ensure code meets our standards of quality and efficiency.

history.title: Backend Engineer (Universe)
history.description: Develop and maintain complex data storage solutions for a music based marketing platform. Work directly with front end engineers to ensure fast and accurate data acquisition and display. Some assistance in front end design.
